usefulItems: wire rack, parchment paper, toothpick, serving plate, springform pan (9 in.), oven
title: Coconut Cake

ingredients.content: 9 oz unsalted butter, cut into pieces, plus extra to grease

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 375°F. Line with parchment and lightly grease a springform pan with butter.
Place sugar into mixing bowl and grind <b>20 sec/speed 10<b>. Add coconut and grind <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Reserve 1 oz sugar mixture (approx. 3 tbsp) to garnish top of cake.
Add butter and without measuring cup whisk <b>55 sec/speed 4<b> while adding eggs one at a time through hole in mixing bowl lid onto rotating blades.
Add flour, orange juice, milk and baking powder and with aid of spatula mix <b>30 sec/speed 5<b>.
Transfer batter into prepared springform pan. Bake for 45-50 minutes (375°F) or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Turn cake out onto a wire rack and allow to cool. Transfer to a serving plate, lightly dust with reserved sugar mixture and serve.
